posts.post_content:
April 27, 1889 - New York versus Boston - The First League Game of the Season.   Shows pics of Ewing, Keefe, Welch and Ward.  Beautiful piece $125  SOLD

May 8, 1886 - A Double Play - First League Game, NY against Boston.  The visual of the grandstand is spectacular!  $99

July 28, 1888 - Cover - A Ball or a Strike.  $99

Nov. 9, 1989 - Cover - William Ewing, Captain of the NY BB Club - $140   SOLD

Shipping included.
